title: Remove relationship intent from Circle Members list UI

requirements.summary: Hide relationship intent (romantic/friendship/both) from member rows in the Circle Members tab while keeping all other member metadata unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: On /authenticated/circle under the Members tab, member rows no longer show any relationship intent text (e.g., "Friendship", "Romantic", or "Both").
Gender (and any other existing member metadata like name/age and pulse badge) continues to render as before.
The frontend TypeScript build passes without unused imports/types related to relationship intent in the members list component.

file_operations.description: Remove relationship intent label rendering from the members list UI (delete the RelationshipIntent import, remove the intent-to-label helper, and stop rendering profile.relationshipIntent in each member row) while keeping existing gender/name/age/pulse UI unchanged.
